A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie made no sense!  An untrained person who can use the force (and not yet a Jedi) is as powerful as the grandson of Darth Vader who was birthed by the force. There was no sensible explanation for Luke to be some old sour hermit how hates Jedis.  I still don’t know what was the point of the movie except to destroy the Star Wars/force folklore.  Complete incoherent waste of time
